about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about RocketPass and get in touch with us.

aboutRocketPass.title: About RocketPass
aboutRocketPass.description: RocketPass is a pioneering space agency dedicated to advancing human space exploration and expanding our understanding of the cosmos. Our mission is to make space travel accessible and inspire the next generation of explorers. Join us on a journey to the stars as we push the boundaries of science and technology.
aboutRocketPass.vision: Vision: To be the leading provider of space travel experiences.
missions: Mars Colonization: Establish the first human settlement on Mars.
Lunar Mining: Extract resources from the Moon to support space travel.
Deep Space Exploration: Send missions beyond our solar system.

team.name: Elon Skywalker
team.bio: Elon is a visionary leader with a passion for space exploration and innovation. He has led RocketPass since its inception.

team.name: Jane Stellar
team.bio: Jane is an expert in astrophysics and has been instrumental in developing RocketPass's groundbreaking technologies.

team.name: Mark Orbit
team.bio: Mark oversees the engineering team, ensuring that all spacecraft are built to the highest standards of safety and efficiency.

contactInfo.address: 123 Space Road, New York, NY 10001, USA
